# encode(commandBuffer:)

**Instance Method**

Encode this scaler denoiser’s work into a command buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
func encode(commandBuffer: any MTLCommandBuffer)
```

## Parameters

- **commandBuffer**: A command buffer into which this scaler denoiser encodes work.
